scripts.build-dev-reports: rimraf wwwroot/Reports && cd WebpackReports && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --devtool=inline-source-map
scripts.build-prod-reports: rimraf wwwroot/Reports && cd WebpackReports && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production --devtool=none
scripts.watch-reports: rimraf wwwroot/Reports && cd WebpackReports && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --devtool=inline-source-map --watch
